title: 109_hr1714
content: Public Servant Retirement Protection Act of 2005 - Amends title II of the Social Security Act (SSA) to repeal the current windfall elimination provision (WEP) for individuals first performing non-covered service beginning one year after enactment of this Act. Establishes a new formula for the treatment of non-covered earnings in determining Social Security benefits. Applies such formula to individuals subject to the current WEP if the benefit under the new formula would be higher.
